title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: I have read books on real estate and I don do many research untop an but I never come across any real estate business men for naija, with how the country be self, person no dey hear about the business 4 naija like other business like that. E be wan ask say, for naija , the business dey easy abi e hard, if you no say you get experience for the business abeg come make you share knowledge on how to do am. Make una no  direct me go Google search ooo, me I no fit trust some information wey dey fly anyhow for that side , I want person with real experience for naija here.  Make I carry this question join, if you dey hear and you Sabi animations with blender app, abeg come make we yarn patua. With the wey the country be, person need find ihn wey before hunger go make ihn ear be like dry leave.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: All I know is that real estate is a good business. It is an investment and a good way to hedge against inflation in Nigeria. But I am not into it because I think it requires huge amount of money, unlike with the small amount of money that you can use to buy bitcoin.Quote from: SatoPrincess on October 01, 2023, 10:50:39 PMThe challenge with real estate investment be say you fit go buy property from person, the person go sell for you and come still sell the same property to four other people or you go dey invest in those fake real estate companies way dey advertise say you fit own your own land with just 100k.If someone do not know what to do about real estate, he should consult his lawyer to show him the way. It is better to pay your lawyer some money than to lose a property because you are not having the legal documents and government backing.After a proper guide from your first investment, you will be able to do the necessary steps after that without anyone in the next investment, but always consult your lawyer whenever and wherever you think is necessary.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on October 01, 2023, 10:25:19 PMI have read books on real estate and I don do many research untop an but I never come across any real estate business men for naija, with how the country be self, person no dey hear about the business 4 naija like other business like that. E be wan ask say, for naija , the business dey easy abi e hard, if you no say you get experience for the business abeg come make you share knowledge on how to do am. So before I go tell you some things make I make you understand say difference dey with the way you read about Real estate for online and wetin dey happen for Nigeria. Oyinbo real estate is mostly about buying already built house, office building etc either new ones and they rent am out or old ones and they put small money into am and rebuild the thing to today standards come rent or sell am but Nigeria own is mostly about land with other few people wey get the cash wey dey buy estates and come rent am out dey collect yearly rent. Make we talk about the buying of land aspect of Real estate because na that one cheap pass and they very profitable pass for Nigeria. The business dey very easy to do when you get the cash and do am well, no go alone go buy land because for Nigeria they way you present yourself na so people go threat you. Go with lawyers and witness (men wey get weigh for the community wey you wan buy land) and finalized the deal with your landlord, after that one make your lawyer follow up with other necessary documents to get to make you have full ownership of the land then secure your land with fencing. When you do things like this, even the landlord go fear to wan resell your land. QuoteIs real estate business lucrative in Nigeria?To answer your question yes, e dey very lucrative but you no go do am like small pikin or e get people's wey be say their only work for life na to dey steal people land with legal or spiritual way and dem go come for you so you need dey prepared. If you get better 5-10 million and land never too cost for your area, brother go buy land and fence am. When development go come your side na when you go know say real estate business na blood money. Land wey you buy 1 million fit give you 5/10 million when you commot all expenses from the land. Just no joke with your investment, secure your land very well, settle the other small small things wey dey dey for land buying so dem no go get any reason to talk say you no pay for you land finish come sell am and even though you dun do everything, keep money for court cases as dem go surely come but with a good lawyer and all your documents intact, you go always win your case.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: To be honest, real estate na one better business for NAIJA ooh, this na based on my own personal experience with people wey dey into the business..Na for real estate I see say person fit do business from January till december and like that for several years without recording any losses.But the downside of the business be say, no be the kind business wey small money fit start, based on how expensive things are in Nigeria today, person go need like 20 to 30 million naira to start real estate business, and another thing wey person gats know again be say, no be every area wey person dey na im such business dey sell out quickly, whether na land or houses, rentage or lease, there are some areas wey no dey liquid enough to make real estate business a Para Para business, so the person will gats to know this and arrange him or her self well to avoid rush in, rush out.

comments.body: Well you try but you gats understand say na very vita question you dey ask and this questions them no dey easily dish am out at least not for peanuts na why them dey get mega conventions for Abuja with regards to real estate.My bro, I go assure you say real estate very very lucrative and that na true beyond all doubts and I never grow to dey standard but I don involve for several landed deals and I must confess say those business na one of the businesses wey give me serious face lift back then.Real estate sharp my bro and I go always tell people to dive especially if you get the money to invest, just buy land and dumb, come thank me later

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: The real estate business na better one and I dey even hear real estate companies say the area still dey untapped for business. Wetin I surely know say na wey don dey for long and old people don ignorantly invest in it for long when them go build house put tenant and from there dey feed and train children for school. The business just dey get face lift lately as job no too dey you come dey see different types of people dey go into land agents and house rentage. Also companies begin establish themselves there, Dem go buy land, build, furnish and rent or lease an out.Now as Naira dey drop, people dey carry their money buy land no matter how small or remote wey the site dey, e go still serve as hedge against inflation. People dey wey no dey hear about put money for bank but if na come buy land, Dem ready go put money there . The thing about buying land and investing on properties be say you go still shine your eyes make dem no knack you but na real investment area wey people dey put money now because at least you no fit sell land wey you the same price after at least 6months to 1 year.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: Real Estate dey hard to get on to because you either but for resale of you build and if u want take that as a source of income, u need to check ur pocket to know the level u  fit invest on. This na why most real estates get doomed to fail where by, them no overview their venture on the scale of wetin them dey invest on and the capital set to take rise the investment.So in a time along the lines them dey fail to fit Finnish up that which them don start leaving the venture on suspend or on pending probably unable to carry it on again to a finishing level and if to be resale, e go come be like say u be distress seller cuz the matter don choke and u go decide to sell am the least instead of a to talk lost.Otherwise, if u succeed to the finishing levels, u don stand to a reliable earnings source of income with no random marketing skills required and doesn't require employees way supposed dey cut ur incomes as u receive.This also no require you things like restocking like our other conventional business but maybe once a while requires u to do maintenances but depending on material qualities. This also saves u management stresses. Most happy 1 of am be say na long time goal of financial obtainment whether na empty land for resale of a built structure for resale all legit. Land no dey routine and no today and tomorrow house dey stay b4 e fit require just maintenance.Warning>>> If u most get on built structures, you must get to a modern style so that e no go cost u waste of finances as a case of restructuring & be aware say na modern world we dey now & people dey go 4 modern tins so ur structures must be modernized and ur land must be in a acceptable locations considering disasters such as flooding area's, I security areas and good land soil textures to fit give reliability to ur structure on-top.These considerations and the case of the modelity has made real estate business a competitive business sector and people also look at something furnished that can be affordable.For sure in life wetin good requires a lot and once achieved na 1 in town. So as this real estate business. So as far as this say come to existence that "Great thing's doesn't mostly comes from the comfort zones", so as people, landlords and landlady's and so on leaves their homes to elsewhere for greener pasture sake so more real estate is in demands and so on it e riches the investor on that sectors.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: The real estate business is very good business for Naija and the world at large because we cannot do without a house if we can afford one. For example, most people leave their place and go to another place to search for a better living, and you need to rent a house to stay in or find a friend or family member way you stay until you see fit to rent a house by yourself. This is why the real estate business will keep on being a lucrative business for Naija. If you get money buy the land first later you fit to do the rest

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Real Estate na very good investment for naija, many places presently dey under development and different infrastructures like tertiary institutions Don dey build for some places wey before be bush.  Real Estate in Nigeria is a very good investment infact land banking is one secure way to make long term investment that will yield good profit but as long as you do your due diligence, like buying land from a reputable company, making sure your land is not situated on a government plan that is to be used for any government purpose,  buying your land in a place that has propects for development and finally make sure say even if you dey buy from person do your finding on the person make them no scam you.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: In as much as real estate business is producing large amount of money, there are also factors that demoralize an investor and one of these factors is a case were you have a tenant that is troublesome you will find out that this tenant will keep frustrating you when their rentage expires and when it's even a tenant that is relevant is government you will find it difficult to deal with that kind of person.And again another factor that again is poor maintenance; it takes so much money to maintain a real estate business because most of your tenants are top government functionaries or wealthy people and this set of people live luxurious lifestyle so for you to maintain it to their taste is also to be considered.Finally, it takes a lot of time to equip and finish the estate and you might run out of cash during the setting of the estate and it might abandoned it since there no much fund to continue thereby it will now look like a liability because since it has not been completed there no way you can start making money from it. And again it takes lots of valid documents before and after setting the estate and these documents as requires large amount of money to be processed.
